name: There Are Definitely Giants
description:
IN DEVELOPMENT

Time to awaken the giants of stone! You play as the spirit of a stone giant and you must prove yourself before you can return to your body. Face a few trials and collect enough flames to be worthy.

First Unity game of a trio of people excited to make games

Débora Moreira artstation.com/deborafm

Rita Duarte twitter.com/Jooncherry

Mariana Terremoto  artstation.com/mmpt
